column1: 5G Mobile Communications and Intelligent Embedded Systems - MSc
column5: We’ve designed this MSc course to give you the up-to-date knowledge and skills needed in modern digital technologies. It's for newly qualified or practising engineers who’d like to extend their knowledge and practical skills in the growth areas of mobile communications and intelligent embedded systems. 5G mobile communications and intelligent embedded systems lie at the heart of many emerging applications. These include:
column7: Find the specific fees for your chosen programme on the website
